DeleteAccount.title: Delete your account
DeleteAccount.label: You can delete you Twake at anytime. Be careful, once your account is deleted, your data will entirely be deleted, there is no going back.

error.message: An error occurred during account deletion request. Please retry or contact our support.

conversations.title: Loss of conversations
conversations.description: By deleting your account, all your conversations on Twake Chat will be permanently lost. You will no longer be able to access or recover your chat history.

groupChat.title: Your group chat
groupChat.description: Once your account is deleted, all private and group messages will be erased with no possibility of recovery. Please make sure to save any important conversations before proceeding.

drive.title: Loss of your files
drive.description: All files stored in your Twake Drive will be deleted. Ensure you back up your data before deleting your account.

mail.title: Loss of your emails
mail.description: By deleting your account, all your Twake Mail emails will be permanently erased. If you have important information, please archive it before proceeding.

line.2: You will not be able to access your Twake anymore
line.3: All your data will be removed
line.4: Please enter your password to validate this action:

errors.invalid_password: Your password doesn't seem to be correct
errors.server_error: An error has occurred, please try again

reason.label: Why do you want to delete your Twake (optionnal)?

email_confirmation.title: Open your mails
email_confirmation.description: An email has been sent to **%{email}**. In order to confirm the deletion of your account, please click on the confirmation link in this email.

success.message: Your deletion request has been sent.

Nav.primary_lock_switch: Lock when the app goes into background

devices.title: You don't have any connected devices
devices.text: By installing the various clients, you will be able to access your files on all your screens et simultaneously. Twake will always be at hand reach, even if you are always on the road!

instance.server_error: Something went wrong with the server. Please, reload the page.

password.title: Password
password.label: Your Twake is currently protected by a password

infos.server_error: Something went wrong. Your informations has not been saved.

password_creation.title: Choose a password
password_creation.help: Use at least eight characters with letters, numbers and symbols.

passphrase.title: Two steps authentication
passphrase.description:
Your Twake sent a 6 digits validation code to %{email}.
Entre the code inside to change your password:

twofa.label:
Because two steps are better than one, improve your Twake security with an additional step.
[Check out our assistance website →](%{link})

modal.protect: Protect your Twake with two steps authentication
modal.change:
**What's changing?** Everytime you'll connect to your Twake, you'll need your password and a validation code.
[Check out our assistance website →](%{link})
modal.secu_description: Password, that's good, but if it isn't "complicated", a thief can easily guess it. Receive a validation code by mail assures the control of your Twake.
modal.protect_title: Improve the protection of your data
modal.protect_description: Even if a thief gets your password, you stay the only captain able to connect to your Twake
modal.desactivate_title: Are you sure to disable this option?
modal.desactivate_description: On clicking on "Desactivate" button, your password will be the only key to access your Twake. You will delete a security level.
modal.confirmation_description: Enter the verification code that has just been emailed to you at **%{email}**
modal.nocode: You do not receive any code?
modal.validation_description: Your Twake is now secured with 2 steps.
modal.email: You should provide a valid email address

public_name.title: Username
public_name.label: Your username will be displayed when you share files with Twake users.

matrix_id.title: Matrix ID
matrix_id.label: Matrix ID is a unique identifier in the Twake platform used for real-time messaging in the open-source Matrix protocol.

phone_number.title: Phone number
phone_number.label: Your phone number will be used to send you notifications and to enable you to recover your password.

default_redirection.title: Home screen
default_redirection.label: This is the first screen you will see when you open your Twake.

move.label: Change your Twake without losing your data

export.title: My data
export.label: Twake Drive is committed to providing you with all the files it stores:
export.server_error: Something went wrong, please try again or contact us.
export.fetch_error: Something went wrong when fetching your export data. Please try again or contact us.
export.missing_error: The archive seems to be missing or expired. Please try again or contact us.
export.success: Your request has correctly be sent!

modal.title: Get back my data
modal.description:
Twake is in charge of getting all data that its has about you and to send you an archive to download.

The download link will be sent to you to the __%{email}__ email address when the archive will be available.

download.title: Download my data
download.description: Here are all the data archive(s) available from your Twake:

import.server_error: Something went wrong, pleasy try again or contact us.
import.invalid_url: The link does not seem to correspond to the download link of a Twake.
import.quota_too_small: The storage space of your Twake is insufficient to import all your data. 2 solutions are available: increase the storage space of your Twake or delete the data not required for import.

modal.title: Import a Twake
modal.description: Fill in the download link sent by email below. To retrieve the download link for a Twake, you just have to launch its export.

confirmation.title: Warning
confirmation.description:
When importing, the data already present in your Twake **%{url}** will be overwritten. Access to your Twake will be blocked until the end of this operation.

Do you really want to continue?

locale.title: Language
locale.label: This will be the language used in your Twake.

DevicesView.load_error: An error occured while loading your devices, please try again later.
DevicesView.device_load_error: We could not find the requested device.

StorageView.title: Storage
StorageView.load_error: An error occurred while loading your storage information, please try again later.
StorageView.storage_warning: Storage is almost full. You can free up space by deleting unnecessary files or subscribing for more space.

infos.server_error: Something went wrong with the server. Please, reload the page.

revokeDevice.title: Revoke this device
revokeDevice.subText: It will immediately stop syncing with this device.
revokeDevice.error: Unable to revoke the device, try to reload the page.

configureDevice.load_error: An error occured while loading your folders, please try again later.

configureDevice.configure_error: Unable to configure the items to synchronize with the device, try to reload the page.
configureDevice.description: Select the folders to synchronize with your computer:
configureDevice.no_folders: You don't have any folders in your Twake.

partialSync.enable: Unselect folders which should not be synchronized:

PassphraseView.title: Update my password

advices.strong_passphrase: **Privilege a strong password:** A long password with numbers and special characters will be impossible to break.
advices.memorize: **Memorize it well:** In case of loss, you will not be able to recover the encrypted passwords in your Twake.
advices.our_tip: **Our tip:** Find a short phrase that suits you, for example:

hint.title: Leave a hint
hint.description: The hint will be emailed to you if you forget your password, choose a hint that only you can understand
hint.same_as_passphrase: Your hint can not be your password

PassphraseView.server_error: Something went wrong. Your password has not been saved.
PassphraseView.wrong_two_fa_code: The provided two factor code seems wrong.

BiometryDeniedDialog.title: Unable to activate
BiometryDeniedDialog.content: To activate this feature, the app needs authorization to access FaceID

LockScreenView.choose_pin_body: Set your PIN to unlock the application after a period of inactivity
LockScreenView.confirm_pin_body: For security reasons, please re-enter your PIN code.
LockScreenView.title: Unlock screen

soon.title: Coming soon
soon.description: This feature is not available yet. For more information, please contact us at contact@cozycloud.cc

support.title: Contact us
support.emailDetail: Your message will be sent from your email address saved in your Twake settings.

message.title: Your request
message.placeholder: Tell us anything (ask for help, share a feedback or just say hello). We'll be happy to talk to you.

consent.label: I temporarily authorize the Twake Workplace support to view the necessary data in my Twake, for the unique purpose of answering this question

response_email.subject: Your request has been correctly received
response_email.allowConsent: Thank you for temporarily allowing Twake Workplace support to view the necessary data in my Twake, for the unique purpose of answering your question.
response_email.body:
Hello,

We correctly received your support request:
%{message}

We are doing our best to respond you as soon as possible.

Claude from Twake.

support.success: 👏 Your message has been sent. Thank you!
support.error: An error occured while sending your message

desktop.title: Get access to your files in your computer
desktop.description: Synchronize all your Twake Drive files on your computer
desktop.button: Install Twake Drive on your desktop

mobile.title: Back up and sync your pics from your mobile
mobile.description: All your memories are safe on your Twake Drive
mobile.button: Install the Twake Drive app on your mobile

cozy-collect.title: Get back your bills instantly
cozy-collect.description: Twake Collect organize all your files instantly

support.title: Contact us
support.emailDetail: Your message will be sent from your email address saved in your Twake settings.

message.placeholder: Tell us anything (ask for help, share a feedback or just say hello). We'll be happy to talk to you.

support.success: 👏 Your message has been sent. Thank you!

errors.noEmailFound: No email address found. Please add one in your Twake settings then try again.

Permissions.title: Applications control
Permissions.access: Applications with this permission can access your
Permissions.monthly_stats_phrase: Data release report from your Twake to %{app} on %{date}:
Permissions.exit_rights_secondary: The data can be taken out of the Twake, it will not be kept secret anymore
Permissions.limited_right_access_secondary: The data is only accessible locally, it never leaves your Twake.
Permissions.exit_right_description: The data is accessible outside the Twake. It can be transmitted to the outside
Permissions.access_right_description: Data is only accessible locally in your Twake. %{app} cannot transmit data outside of the Twake Workplace or to anyone else.
Permissions.read_right_text: The app can read the data inside the Twake without making it accessible to its editor
Permissions.write_right_text: The app can add, modify, or delete data

EmailSection.title: E-mail
EmailSection.subtitle: Twake needs your e-mail address to send you notifications and to enable you to recover your password.

alert.title: Modification pending
alert.content: An email has been sent to %{pendingEmail} to verify your identity and finalise the change to your email address.

snackbar.server_error: Something went wrong with the server. Please, reload the page.
snackbar.resend_success: An email has been sent to %{pendingEmail}

EmailReadOnlySection.title: E-mail
EmailReadOnlySection.subtitle: The email address is fixed and used for authentication within the Matrix network.

errors.server: Something went wrong with the server. Please, reload the page.
errors.same_email: Your new email cannot be the same as your old one.
errors.email_format: The e-mail address does not feel right. Are you sure you wrote it correctly (e.g. john@wayne.com)?

flags.drive.office.write: Online Office documents editor (word processing, spreadsheet, and presentation)

error.fileType: The file type is not supported. Please try again.
error.deleteFailed: The avatar deletion has failed. Please try again.

content.delete:
You have subscribed to a Twake offer via the %{vendor}. **Please cancel your subscription before deleting your Twake account.**

If you have already done so, or if you wish to do so later directly via your store, you can ignore this message and continue deleting your Twake.
content.move:
You have subscribed to a Twake offer via the %{vendor}. **Please cancel your subscription before moving your Twake account.**

If you have already done so, or if you wish to do so later directly via your store, you can ignore this message and continue moving your Twake.
